name: @vibe-anywhere/agent
description: Vibe Anywhere sidecar agent for LXC containers

scripts.bundle: npm run build && npm run bundle:cli && tar -czf agent-bundle.tar.gz dist cli package.json package-lock.json
scripts.bundle:cli: cd ../vibe-anywhere-cli && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../agent/cli && cp dist/vibe-anywhere ../agent/cli/vibe-anywhere && chmod +x ../agent/cli/vibe-anywhere
